scenes.background: You are leading a project team that has just received an urgent assignment requiring a significant amount of work to be completed within a tight deadline. The team is feeling a lot of pressure, and morale is low, with some members showing signs of frustration and anxiety. Previously, when one of the team members, Alex, said, 'This is impossible! We can't get this done in time,' you responded by encouraging the team to stay focused and work together. During a team meeting, [Monica] slammed her pen on the table and added, 'Even if we try our best, there's no way we can meet this deadline.' [Bob] nodded in agreement, looking equally concerned. You suggested taking a pause to rethink the approach. Now, with the team gathered again, [Monica] leaned back in her chair, crossing her arms, and said, 'So, what’s the new grand plan?' You responded by suggesting to reassess the resources and see if additional support can be obtained. Now, [Bob] rubs his temples and mutters, 'I just can't see how this will work. We're setting ourselves up for failure.' [Monica] exhales deeply, clearly frustrated. Your suggestion of bringing in temporary help was met with mixed reactions. [Monica] and [Bob] are still visibly stressed.
scenes.description: [Monica] looks at you with a mix of skepticism and hope, 'Okay, but where do we find this temporary help on such short notice?' [Bob] remains silent but looks at you expectantly, waiting for a concrete plan.

options.text: Let's reach out to our network and see if anyone can recommend reliable temporary workers.
options.analysis: You suggested leveraging your network to find help, showing good emotional perception and empathy while being practical.

options.text: I understand the concern. We may need to prioritize tasks and focus on what's most critical.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the concern and proposed prioritizing tasks, demonstrating good self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: We’ve always found a way to pull through. Let’s focus on our strengths and tackle this with determination.
options.analysis: You focused on motivating the team by highlighting their strengths, demonstrating high motivation but lower empathy and emotional perception.
